io.github.gotonode.compress.ui

Class UiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.gotonode.compress.ui.UiController

  • public class UiController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles printing to the console and reading from it.

    It is not tested and because of this it is ignored in code coverage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UiController(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Initializes this object.

        Prints the app's URL on GitHub. The user can download the newest version from there.

      • askForCharacter

        public char askForCharacter(java.lang.Character[] allowedChars,
                            java.lang.String prompt)
        Continuously ask the user for a character, until a valid one is given.
        Parameters:
        allowedChars - A list of chars that are accepted.
        prompt - What to ask the user.
        Returns:
        A valid uppercase character.

      • printDifference

        public void printDifference(long sourceBytes,
                            long targetBytes,
                            double difference)
        Prints the difference in size (input file, output file) in kilobytes.
        Parameters:
        sourceBytes - The input file's size.
        targetBytes - The output file's size.
        difference - The difference (as a percentage). Should be pre-calculated as this is only an UI class and shouldn't handle calculations like that.

      • printOperationTime

        public void printOperationTime(long milliseconds)
        Prints how long the operation took, in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - A long value containing the operation time.

      • printCompressionBenchmarkResults

        public void printCompressionBenchmarkResults(Algorithms algorithm,
                                             long compressionTime)
        Prints results from compression benchmarking.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Which algorithm was used.
        compressionTime - How much time it took to compress the sample data (in milliseconds).

      • printDecompressionBenchmarkResults

                                               long decompressionTime)
        Prints results from decompression benchmarking.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Which algorithm was used.
        decompressionTime - How much time it took to decompress the sample data (in milliseconds).

      • printReducedFileSize

        public void printReducedFileSize(Algorithms algorithm,
                                 long compressedFileSize,
                                 double reduction)
        Prints the compressed file's size and the reduction to the size of the original.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Which algorithm was used.
        compressedFileSize - The size of the newly-compressed file.
        reduction - Reduction, as a percentage.

      • printIncreasedFileSize

                                   long compressedFileSize,
                                   double increase)
        If the compressed file got bigger, print information about it.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Which algorithm was used.
        compressedFileSize - The size of the newly-compressed file.
        increase - Increase amount, as a percentage.
